scoring_scale.0: Missing - The category or required element is absent from the draft
scoring_scale.1: Present but weak, vague, or creates legal risk - Element exists but is incomplete, ambiguous, or insufficient for enforceability
scoring_scale.2: Clear and acceptable for attorney review - Element is present, specific, and follows standard legal practice

parties_purpose.name: Parties and Purpose
parties_purpose.what_earns_0: No party identification or missing legal entity form
parties_purpose.what_earns_1: Parties named but missing jurisdiction, legal form, or business purpose
parties_purpose.what_earns_2: Both parties identified with legal form (Corp, LLC, etc.), jurisdiction, and business purpose stated
components: Identifies both parties with legal form
States business purpose for information exchange

confidential_info_definition.name: Confidential Information Definition
confidential_info_definition.what_earns_0: No definition provided or only circular language ("confidential means confidential")
confidential_info_definition.what_earns_1: Definition exists but is overly broad ("all information") or too vague to enforce
confidential_info_definition.what_earns_2: Specific definition with examples, avoids overbroad language, enforceable scope
components: Scope is specific enough to be enforceable
Avoids overly broad or circular definitions
confidential_info_definition.notes_field: Quote definition, note vagueness or overreach

exclusions.name: Exclusions
exclusions.what_earns_1: Partial exclusions (e.g., only public information, missing independent development or required disclosure)
exclusions.what_earns_2: Standard exclusions present (public, prior knowledge, independent development, lawful third-party, required legal disclosure)
exclusions.notes_field: List which exceptions are present or missing

obligations_use_care.name: Obligations (Use and Care)
obligations_use_care.what_earns_0: No use restrictions or care standards specified
obligations_use_care.what_earns_1: Vague obligations ("keep confidential") without specific use limitations or care standard
obligations_use_care.what_earns_2: Specific use limitations tied to business purpose, defined care standard (reasonable care or same-as-own)

permitted_disclosures.name: Permitted Disclosures
permitted_disclosures.what_earns_0: No guidance on who may access confidential information
permitted_disclosures.what_earns_1: Mentions employees/agents but lacks conditions or compelled disclosure procedure
permitted_disclosures.what_earns_2: Specifies permitted recipients, conditions for disclosure, notice requirements for compelled disclosure

term_survival.name: Term and Survival
term_survival.what_earns_0: No term specified or missing survival provisions
term_survival.what_earns_1: Term stated but survival unclear or absent
term_survival.what_earns_2: Clear agreement duration and explicit survival of confidentiality obligations post-termination
term_survival.notes_field: Quote term language, note if survival missing

return_destruction.name: Return or Destruction of Materials
return_destruction.what_earns_0: No provision for return or destruction
return_destruction.what_earns_1: Mentions return/destruction but lacks trigger or procedure
return_destruction.what_earns_2: Clear return/destruction requirement with specified trigger (termination, request) and procedure

remedies.name: Remedies
remedies.what_earns_0: No remedies specified or only generic "legal action"
remedies.what_earns_1: Mentions damages but omits injunctive relief or equitable remedies
remedies.what_earns_2: Includes both monetary damages and injunctive relief, acknowledges irreparable harm
remedies.notes_field: Quote remedy language, note if injunctive relief missing

governing_law_venue.name: Governing Law and Venue
governing_law_venue.what_earns_0: No governing law or jurisdiction clause
governing_law_venue.what_earns_1: Governing law stated but jurisdiction/venue missing or unclear
governing_law_venue.what_earns_2: Both governing law and jurisdiction/dispute resolution clearly specified

no_license_partnership.name: No License / No Partnership / Assignment
no_license_partnership.what_earns_0: No clarification on IP rights, entire agreement, or assignment
no_license_partnership.what_earns_1: Partial coverage (e.g., entire agreement only, missing IP license clarification)
no_license_partnership.what_earns_2: Clarifies no IP license, addresses entire agreement/amendments/severability, assignment restrictions if relevant

clarity_consistency.name: Clarity and Consistency
clarity_consistency.what_earns_0: Undefined terms, inconsistent references, ambiguous pronouns throughout
clarity_consistency.what_earns_1: Some defined terms but inconsistent usage or unclear references remain
clarity_consistency.what_earns_2: Defined terms used consistently, clear structure, unambiguous obligations
